H0.text: Hillary Mantel won the 2009 Booker Prize with which novel. The Little Stranger

H1.text: Hillary Mantel won the 2009 Booker Prize with which novel. The Children's Book

H2.text: Hillary Mantel won the 2009 Booker Prize with which novel. Summertime

H3.text: Hillary Mantel won the 2009 Booker Prize with which novel. Wolf Hall

A4.text: Wolf Hall was the 2009 Booker Prize winner.

A5.text: Upon its release in 2009, it was the fastest-selling Booker winner since the organization began tracking such data.
